description: This file is a React-like component (using Qwik framework) for the recipe detail page, retrieving recipe data by ID from URL params, handling loading state, and rendering recipe details or a not found message.

methods.name: component$
methods.description: Defines the Qwik component for the recipe detail page.

methods.name: useVisibleTask$
methods.description: Runs side effects when the component becomes visible, fetching recipe data.
